name: Zombie X
description:
You may recall me a few weeks back uploading a demo for my final major project for college called Zombie X. Well this version is the final version meaning that this is the final outcome of all the work I have done for this and I think its complete. I will now bullet point some of the changes that I have made to the project

.Added a zombie model over the enemies so now zombies chase you instead purple squares.

.More enemies have been added than just two so there is more of a challenge this time around

.Zombies come with a walk cycle now so when the move towards you they do not float T pose style 

.Secret stash of bananas are hidden in the woods. 

If you have any criticisms or questions please let me know

Thanks for helping :)
